definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

pinyin: A1 bi3 xi1 ni2 ya4 ren2
A1 bi3 xi1 ni2 ya4 Guan1 hua4

sentences.chinese: 那是個阿比西尼亞姑娘。
那是個阿比西尼亞少女。

sentences.english: Finally the revolt in abyssinia was being fanned by every means .
sentences.chinese: 最後，還使用一切方法煽動阿比西尼亞起義。

sentences.english: This leads to the Abyssinia Crisis.
sentences.chinese: 此事件導致後來的阿比西尼亞危機。
